body:
Comment 2: 
Source code?

Do you have a more minimal reproducible example?

Also,

> then I add a http interface (using template) and a background
> goroutine to update stats, built with recent release r60.1 and
> recent weekly release weekly.2011-09-21, 

That's a lot of changes at once.

Can you isolate it down to one change which made it unstable?
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
